description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Player avatars lead a troupe of 100 other avatar dancers!  Throw in 30 new dance moves, 11 new songs, 3 new dance floors, and adjustable strobe and colored lighting, and you’ll be tearin’ up the dance floor!  Avatars can also dance to custom soundtracks – a great way to play music at parties!  Let your avatar unleash its dance moves in this awesome follow-up to the original hit, Avatar Boogie!
